00003 #include "ORDGF4cWaveformTreeWriter.hh"
00004 #include "ORLogger.hh"
00005 
00006 using namespace std;

00008 ORDGF4cWaveformTreeWriter::ORDGF4cWaveformTreeWriter(string treeName) :
00009 ORVTreeWriter(new ORDGF4cEventDecoder, treeName)
00010 {
00011   fEventDecoder = dynamic_cast<ORDGF4cEventDecoder*>(fDataDecoder);
00012   fEventTime = 0;
00013   fCrate = 0;
00014   fCard = 0;
00015   fChannel = 0;
00016   fEnergy = 0;
00017   fWaveformLength = 0;
00018   fWaveform[0] = 0;  // this is on the stack, not the heap.
00019   SetDoNotAutoFillTree();
00020 }
00021 
00022 ORDGF4cWaveformTreeWriter::~ORDGF4cWaveformTreeWriter()
00023 {
00024   delete fEventDecoder;
00025 }
00026 
00027 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORDGF4cWaveformTreeWriter::InitializeBranches()
00028 {
00029   fTree->Branch("wfLength", &fWaveformLength, "wfLength/I");
00030   fTree->Branch("eventTime", &fEventTime, "eventTime/D");
00031   fTree->Branch("crate", &fCrate, "crate/s");
00032   fTree->Branch("card", &fCard, "card/s");
00033   fTree->Branch("channel", &fChannel, "channel/s");
00034   fTree->Branch("energy", &fEnergy, "energy/s");
00035   fTree->Branch("waveform", fWaveform, "waveform[wfLength]/s");
00036   return kSuccess;
00037 }
00038 
00039 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORDGF4cWaveformTreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00040 {
00041   // the event decoder could run into a problem, but this might not
00042   // ruin the rest of the run.
00043   if(!fEventDecoder->SetDataRecord(record)) return kFailure;
00044   ORLog(kDebug) << "Found events: " << fEventDecoder->GetDGFNEvents() << endl;
00045   for (size_t i = 0; i < fEventDecoder->GetDGFNEvents(); i++) 
00046   {
00047     for (size_t k = 0; k < fEventDecoder->GetNChannels(i); k++) 
00048     {
00049       // check severity to improve speed:
00050       ORLog(kDebug) << "Found channels: " << fEventDecoder->GetNChannels(i)
00051           << " in event: " << i  << endl;
00052       if (ORLogger::GetSeverity() >= ORLogger::kDebug) 
00053       { 
00054         ORLog(kDebug) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): "
00055           << "event-time-crate-card-channel-energy = "
00056           << i << "-" 
00057           << fEventDecoder->GetEventTime(i) << "-"
00058           << fEventDecoder->CrateOf() << "-"
00059           << fEventDecoder->CardOf() << "-" 
00060           << k << "-"
00061           << fEventDecoder->GetChanEnergy(i,k) << endl;
00062       }
00063     fEventTime = fEventDecoder->GetDGFEventTime(i);
00064     fCrate = fEventDecoder->CrateOf();
00065     fCard = fEventDecoder->CardOf();
00066     fChannel = fEventDecoder->GetChannelNumber(i,k);
00067     fEnergy = fEventDecoder->GetChanEnergy(i,k);
00068     fWaveformLength = (Int_t) fEventDecoder->CopyWaveformData(fWaveform, kMaxWFLength, i, k);
00069     fTree->Fill();
00070     }
00071   }
00072   return kSuccess;
00073 }
